EmailTemplate.name: NRF-2021 Email.3-3-21 RET NRF-2021 Email Post Event Email.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Take a Click Through This Virtual NRF Booth + Q&A Replay
EmailTemplate.textOnly: In case you missed NRF’s virtual Big Show, we’re bringing it to you right here. First up—if you’re a retailer frustrated about all the changes 2020 brought, listen to the replay of our recent NRF Fireside Chat: Change, made simple: How retailers adapt in a shifting environment. <[[https://nrf.app.box.com/s/ujov5lx51axg44slg3xvayzksowg0vug]]> You’ll hear NCR’s David Wilkinson, President & GM of Retail, and Becca Coggins, Senior Partner at McKinsey, host a Q&A about retail’s biggest challenges, the latest tech advancements and more. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Click through our interactive virtual booth to see our most transformative tech. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
